title: Phoenix teen, 16, dead in accidental shooting
content:
A 16-year-old shot Monday while handling a handgun has died, Phoenix police said Tuesday.
Brandon Ramirez, 16, died overnight from his injures, according to Sgt. Jonathan Howard, Phoenix police spokesman.
Police received a shooting call to the 1600 block of West Missouri Avenue about 8 p.m. Detectives continued to investigate, but early evidence indicated that Ramirez was mishandling a handgun when it discharged, Howard said in a statement.
Ramirez had been playing with the gun with a friend, police said.
